solution_line_template: The second earthquake caused {multiplier} * {first_eq_buildings} = <<{multiplier}*{first_eq_buildings}={second_eq_buildings}>>{second_eq_buildings} buildings to collapse.
The third earthquake caused {multiplier} * {second_eq_buildings} = <<{multiplier}*{second_eq_buildings}={third_eq_buildings}>>{third_eq_buildings} buildings to collapse.
The fourth earthquake caused {third_eq_buildings} * {multiplier} = <<{third_eq_buildings}*{multiplier}={fourth_eq_buildings}>>{fourth_eq_buildings} buildings to collapse.

Including the first earthquake, the earthquakes caused {first_eq_buildings} + {second_eq_buildings} + {third_eq_buildings} + {fourth_eq_buildings} = <<{first_eq_buildings}+{second_eq_buildings}+{third_eq_buildings}+{fourth_eq_buildings}={total_collapsed}>>{total_collapsed} buildings to collapse.
